scripts.dev: npx concurrently "cd server && yarn dev" "cd dinrestaurang && yarn dev" "cd adminpanel && yarn dev"
scripts.lint: yarn --cwd ./server lint && yarn --cwd ./dinrestaurang lint && yarn --cwd ./adminpanel lint
scripts.format: yarn --cwd ./server format && yarn --cwd ./dinrestaurang format && yarn --cwd ./adminpanel format
scripts.clear: npx rimraf node_modules dist build && cd server && npx rimraf node_modules dist build docs dbDocs && cd .. && cd dinrestaurang && npx rimraf node_modules dist build && cd .. && cd adminpanel && npx rimraf node_modules dist build
